column4: i go on to youtube and it says i need to install a flash plugin. i already have flash installed i installed it through apt-get but i still get the message so i press install missing plugins then it tells me it is already installed yet i still get the message on youtube asking me to install flash :S  heeelp ?
it is i checked and it is 6 update 3
I had the same problems yesterday
1) I completely remove gnash, flash plugins, and firefox itself 2) I reinstalled firefox and install adobe flash plugins only adobe's one
